programme.title: Ripples: CNIB Lake Joe
programme.desc: What started out as a chance for a small group of campers in the 1950s has come to be a rite of passage for thousands. Capture the essence of CNIB Lake Joe.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP11) Detective Murdoch and Dr. Julia Ogden find themselves at odds when a delusional woman becomes the prime suspect in the violent stabbing of her gambling fiancé.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP30) On débute l'émission avec le hockey inclusif et on poursuit avec la loi récente sur l'accessibilité en Colombie-Britannique. On vous présente aussi, une oreillette intelligente qui détecte plus rapidement l'Alzheimer ou le Parkinson.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP04) In this episode of #IGotThis: Lady issues. Meet a business owner, mom and wife who is learning to better appreciate life when endometriosis slows her down. And, meet a woman with pelvic pain who works double-time to keep her mind active and healthy.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) Elizabeth takes a special interest in one of her students, Rosaleen Sullivan, who has not spoken since the mine disaster. Jack begins to look into the church fire, but puts the investigation on hold when Rosaleen goes missing.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary LeVeaux-Coulter) Kavan Smith (Leland Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: You Can't Ask That
programme.desc:
(S01EP06) Little people face social stigma and curiosity. In this episode, we meet people from different backgrounds who explain what it is like to live in a world that sees them as disabled.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S02EP08) Four Senses is aging and curing on this week's episode. Chef Justin Wolfe of The Early Bird and Rock Au Taco joins Christine Ha and Carl Heinrich in the kitchen to share his expertise on curing.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
Jen Powley is a force of nature. An author and disability rights activist, she has two Masters degrees and she sits on five boards. Now, Jen is embarking on her most challenging journey yet: running for municipal councilor during a pandemic.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S02EP09) Chris and Alex go in with a clang and out with a bang, creating a vibrant 'sound garden' play area for a children's facility and building a multi-purpose loft bed to re-imagine a room.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Pieta Bouma was just 19 years old when she broke her back while living in Ecuador. Nearly two years on she's immersed in student life, finding new ways to enjoy old loves, and becoming a strong voice for the community.
Année : 2011
